title: Louise Haigh – 2021 Comments on PCR Testing Costs
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Louise Haigh, the Shadow Transport Secretary, on 5 December 2021.
content:
Many flying home for their first Christmas since the pandemic began will be hit with scandalous testing costs.
